formdata.value: A comprehensive task management application built with React and Node.js, featuring AI-powered task prioritization, smart scheduling, and collaborative workspaces. The app uses machine learning algorithms to analyze user behavior and suggest optimal task scheduling.
AI-powered task management with smart scheduling and collaboration features
[{"role":"Frontend Developer","contribution":"React components and UI design"},{"role":"ML Engineer","contribution":"AI algorithms and model training"}]
[{"title":"Best Innovation Award","description":"Won first place at University Tech Fest 2024","date":"2024-09-20","organization":"IIIT Sri City"}]
Enhanced version of the task management application with improved AI algorithms, better user interface, and new collaboration features.
